  • Uses of AcrossContext in com.foreach.across.core.context

    Methods in com.foreach.across.core.context with parameters of type AcrossContext
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer>
    AcrossContextUtils.getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context)
    Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to apply for the AcrossContext itself.
    static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer>
    AcrossContextUtils.getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context, AcrossModule module)
    Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers in the module, combined with the ones registered on the AcrossContext that are specified to apply to all modules.
    static AcrossContextInfo
    AcrossContextUtils.getContextInfo(AcrossContext context)
    Returns the running AcrossContextInfo for a defined AcrossContext.
    static org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext
    AcrossContextUtils.getParentApplicationContext(AcrossContext context)
    Returns the Spring ApplicationContext that this AcrossContext is a child of.
    static void
    AcrossContextUtils.refreshBeans(AcrossContext context)
    Will refresh all @Refreshable annotated components in the AcrossContext and perform annotated autowiring again.
